data.text: @MrUrban83 @IanPidgeon3 @Tnewton_1988 Exactly. It's to do with light on Rosebury Avenue. Unless we do a compulsory purchase at some point (could happen?) then we will always face this problem unfortunately.
@MrUrban83 @davo261088 @Tnewton_1988 Yes. How many football teams would surrender that to residential areas these days it's ludicrous
@davo261088 @IanPidgeon3 @Tnewton_1988 Did you know that the bridgeford end wen built in 92 goes down a level to one teir because it had to accommodate what the residents wanted...
@AshRossDavis1 @Tnewton_1988 Thought it was a Derby Uni journalist student for a min 😁

@Tnewton_1988 So you remember when we were going to build a new stadium in Clifton ?

Calm down lads, it's just a drawing.
@Tnewton_1988 The most annoying thing is the non communication to fans about it - despite asking for season ticket renewals #nffc
@AshRossDavis1 Just want them to achieve planning permission!
